dict.string: Can we use your location at all times? This is required for continuous GPS tracking when recording a trail.
Can we use your location when your app is being used? This helps us show personalized trails based on your location, and weather features.
Can we use your location when your app is being used? This helps us show personalized trails based on your location, and weather features.
Can we use your location when your app is being used? This is required for personalized trails based on your location, and weather features.
This app needs access to photos gallery for picking photos and videos to be used with local trail thumbnails.
This app needs access to the photo gallery for picking photos and videos to be used with local trail thumbnails.
This app needs access to the camera to take photos to be used as a thumbnail for recorded trails.
